subject: Basketball
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: The Heat’s title defense is dependent on Dwyane Wade’s wobbly knee, Chris Bosh’s wilting confidence and LeBron James’s apparently wavering faith in his struggling co-stars.
snippet: The Heat’s title defense is dependent on Dwyane Wade’s wobbly knee, Chris Bosh’s wilting confidence and LeBron James’s apparently wavering faith in his struggling co-stars.
